item.title: The weak things of the world are strong because...
item.description: ![Weak things of this world are strong ](http://benrwoodard.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/img_0423.jpg)It is hard to comprehend but easy to experience in our culture. The idea that the worldly system is going to naturally believe the things of God are weak is something we need to consider when we begin evaluating the impact a Biblically based teaching will have in our life. This is not asceticism. That is a form of legalism that taught people to make themselves weak and foolish in order to “suffer” with Christ.
